mapper.insert: Insert into community(community_num,community_category,community_title, community_context, community_date, community_map, user_id, community_place, community_schedule) values(community_seq.nextval, #{community_category}, #{community_title}, #{community_context}, TO_DATE(sysdate,'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi'), #{community_map}, #{user_id},#{community_place}, TO_DATE(sysdate,'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi'))
